titles.title: A bill for the relief of Ruben Mkoian, Asmik Karapetian, and Arthur Mkoyan.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S5452, S5453-5455)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
6/10/2008--Introduced.
Provides for the relief of Ruben Mkoian, Asmik Karapetian, and Arthur Mkoyan.
